job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: wework is hiring a frontend software engineer to build and maintain the services that power our internal and memberfacing applications hundreds of thousands of members around the world rely on these services to book spaces at wework locations get support learn about and gain entry to their building invite guests and work efficiently while in our spaces wework is adapting to the realities of covid and seeking to support new members and new flexibility in coworking space and our technology must rapidly adapt to support the business this role will be working on an established team of experienced engineers responsible for multiple services and will have a direct impact on executive level initiativesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtabout youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtenjoy working in an agile development environment and taking initiatives in improving systems for the sake of your teammates and our usersltligtltligtable to utilize design coding patterns tools and frameworks and methods to facilitate in effectively meeting the team sprint objectives and the overall quarterly team objectivesltligtltligtas excited to write tests and docs as you are to write readable and efficient codeltligtltligtcan drive feature development endtoend and deliver large projects at quarterly levelltligtltligtcomfortable working with product managers designers data scientists peer engineering leads and managers and nontechnical executive stakeholdersltligtltligtflexible attitude and able to adapt to rapidly changing requirements and business needsltligtltligteager to dive in and contribute to longlived systems and improve them for the sake of our members and for your fellow engineers without getting stuck on ensuring perfectionltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtrequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelor degree in computer science and years of experience developing web applications or equivalent experienceltligtltligtstrong knowledge and experience using javascript es ltligtltligtstrong experience using single pages application technologies like react redux typescript and css extensions sass or lessltligtltligtintegrated with different api resources like restful apis apollo graphql or jsonschema to support the frontend clientsltligtltligtexperience working with map sdks like google maps mapbox leaflet or openlayers is a plusltligtltligtpreferred experience writing unit and end to end tests with frameworks like jest and puppeteerltligtltligtcomfortable with aws postgresqlmysql docker circleci npm yarn and githubltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtabout weworkltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwework is the platform for creators providing hundreds of thousands of members around the world with space community and services that enable them to do what they love and create their lifes work our mission is to create a world where people work to make a life not just a living and our own team members are central to that goalltbrgtltbrgtour mission doesnt end with the small businesses and entrepreneurs that call us home we believe in empowering our team to create their own lifes work we move fast and we challenge each other but we look after each other and care about our culture which makes working here extremely rewarding theres a lot of work left for us to do and we couldnt do it without a single member of our teamltbrgtltbrgtwe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusltbrgtltbrgtwework will not cover the cost of relocation for this position should your application be successful you would be responsible for your own relocation expenses
